title: Sampler, 1796
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, eyelet, and double-running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Beneath alphabet and numbers scattered motifs including Cain slaying Abel, spies of Eschol, birds and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1796.
1796. Medium: cotton embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, eyelet, and double-running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-190.
